languages.text: "Ваши... почитатели продолжают распространять слово о Светоче. Все больше и больше людей в протекторате фон Валанциус принимают новую веру как истинную. Поборники старого культа истребляются или уходят в тень".

"Your... devotees continue their work of spreading the word of the Great Beacon. There are more and more people in the von Valancius protectorate who have accepted the new faith as the one true belief. The followers of the old cult are either hunted down or forced into hiding."
languages.original_text: "Ваши... почитатели продолжают распространять слово о Светоче. Все больше и больше людей в протекторате фон Валанциус принимают новую веру как истинную. Поборники старого культа истребляются или уходят в тень".

traits.locale_text: "Your... devotees continue their work of spreading the word of the Great Beacon. There are more and more people in the von Valancius protectorate who have accepted the new faith as the one true belief. The followers of the old cult are either hunted down or forced into hiding."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

traits.speaker: HighFactotum

traits.locale_text: "Your... devotees continue their work of spreading the word of the Great Beacon. There are more and more people in the von Valancius protectorate who have accepted the new faith as the one true belief. The followers of the old cult are either hunted down or forced into hiding."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

traits.locale_text: "Your... devotees continue their work of spreading the word of the Great Beacon. There are more and more people in the von Valancius protectorate who have accepted the new faith as the one true belief. The followers of the old cult are either hunted down or forced into hiding."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: “您的……信徒们依然在继续他们的工作，传播至高明光的话语。冯·瓦兰修斯王朝越来越多的人接受了新的信仰，作为他们真正、唯一的信仰。那些旧日教派的信徒要么遭到了追捕，要么被迫躲藏起来。”
languages.original_text: "Your... devotees continue their work of spreading the word of the Great Beacon. There are more and more people in the von Valancius protectorate who have accepted the new faith as the one true belief. The followers of the old cult are either hunted down or forced into hiding."

traits.locale_text: “您的……信徒们依然在继续他们的工作，传播至高明光的话语。冯·瓦兰修斯王朝越来越多的人接受了新的信仰，作为他们真正、唯一的信仰。那些旧日教派的信徒要么遭到了追捕，要么被迫躲藏起来。”
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: "Eure ... Anhänger setzen ihr Werk fort, die Kunde des Großen Leuchtfeuers zu verbreiten. Es gibt im Protektorat von Valancius mehr und mehr, die den neuen Glauben als einzig wahren angenommen haben. Die Anhänger des alten Kults werden entweder gejagt oder sind gezwungen, unterzutauchen."
languages.original_text: "Your... devotees continue their work of spreading the word of the Great Beacon. There are more and more people in the von Valancius protectorate who have accepted the new faith as the one true belief. The followers of the old cult are either hunted down or forced into hiding."

traits.locale_text: "Eure ... Anhänger setzen ihr Werk fort, die Kunde des Großen Leuchtfeuers zu verbreiten. Es gibt im Protektorat von Valancius mehr und mehr, die den neuen Glauben als einzig wahren angenommen haben. Die Anhänger des alten Kults werden entweder gejagt oder sind gezwungen, unterzutauchen."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: « Vos... disciples continuent de répandre la parole {mf|du|de la} guide suprême. De nombreux sujets du protectorat von Valancius ont déjà accepté cette nouvelle religion comme seul et unique système de foi. Quant aux fidèles de l'ancien culte, ils sont traqués et contraints de se cacher. »
languages.original_text: "Your... devotees continue their work of spreading the word of the Great Beacon. There are more and more people in the von Valancius protectorate who have accepted the new faith as the one true belief. The followers of the old cult are either hunted down or forced into hiding."

traits.locale_text: « Vos... disciples continuent de répandre la parole {mf|du|de la} guide suprême. De nombreux sujets du protectorat von Valancius ont déjà accepté cette nouvelle religion comme seul et unique système de foi. Quant aux fidèles de l'ancien culte, ils sont traqués et contraints de se cacher. »
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: «Sus... devotos siguen propagando la palabra del Gran Faro. Cada vez hay más gente en el protectorado von Valancius que han aceptado la nueva fe como el único credo verdadero. Los seguidores del antiguo culto han sido atrapados u obligados a esconderse».
languages.original_text: "Your... devotees continue their work of spreading the word of the Great Beacon. There are more and more people in the von Valancius protectorate who have accepted the new faith as the one true belief. The followers of the old cult are either hunted down or forced into hiding."

traits.locale_text: «Sus... devotos siguen propagando la palabra del Gran Faro. Cada vez hay más gente en el protectorado von Valancius que han aceptado la nueva fe como el único credo verdadero. Los seguidores del antiguo culto han sido atrapados u obligados a esconderse».
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: 「あなたの…信者たちは、大いなるビーコンの言葉を広める仕事を続けています。フォン・ヴァランシウス保護国家では、新しい信仰を唯一の真実の信仰として受け入れる人々が増えています。古の魔女団の信奉者たちは、追いつめられるか、隠れることを余儀なくされています」
languages.original_text: "Your... devotees continue their work of spreading the word of the Great Beacon. There are more and more people in the von Valancius protectorate who have accepted the new faith as the one true belief. The followers of the old cult are either hunted down or forced into hiding."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの…信者たちは、大いなるビーコンの言葉を広める仕事を続けています。フォン・ヴァランシウス保護国家では、新しい信仰を唯一の真実の信仰として受け入れる人々が増えています。古の魔女団の信奉者たちは、追いつめられるか、隠れることを余儀なくされています」
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: "Bir de... zahitleriniz, Yüce Kılavuz'un sözlerini yaymak için gayretlerini sürdürdü. Von Valancius protektorasında bu yeni dini tek ve hakiki din olarak kabul edenlerin sayısı gitgide artıyor. Eski tarikatın müritleri ya öldürülüyor ya da saklanmaya mecbur bırakılıyor."
languages.original_text: "Your... devotees continue their work of spreading the word of the Great Beacon. There are more and more people in the von Valancius protectorate who have accepted the new faith as the one true belief. The followers of the old cult are either hunted down or forced into hiding."
